name: Acropolis of Athens
description: An ancient citadel in Athens, Greece, featuring the Parthenon, an iconic temple dedicated to Athena.

name: Angkor Wat
description: A stunning temple complex in Cambodia, the largest religious monument in the world, known for its intricate architecture.

name: Chichen Itza
description: A pre-Columbian archaeological site in Mexico, renowned for its stepped pyramid and ancient history.

name: Christ the Redeemer
description: A towering statue of Jesus in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, offering panoramic views of the city and bay.

name: Château de Chambord
description: A majestic French castle in the Loir-et-Cher region, known for its distinctive French Renaissance architecture.

name: Colosseum
description: An ancient Roman amphitheater in Rome, famous for gladiatorial contests and grand architectural design.

name: Easter Island Moai
description: Gigantic stone statues on Easter Island, Chile, carved by the Rapa Nui people centuries ago.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: Iconic wrought-iron tower in Paris, known for its stunning city views and architectural elegance.

name: Great Wall of China
description: A monumental wall and fortification in northern China, celebrated for its historical significance and vast length.

name: Hagia Sophia
description: An architectural wonder in Istanbul, Turkey, once a cathedral and mosque, now a museum.

name: Machu Picchu
description: An ancient Incan citadel in the Andes Mountains, known for its breathtaking views and archaeological significance.

name: Mesa Verde

name: Meteora
description: A complex of monasteries perched atop towering rock columns in Greece, offering breathtaking views.

name: Mount Everest
description: The tallest mountain on Earth, part of the Himalayas, and a challenging destination for climbers.

name: Mount Fuji

name: Mount Rushmore

name: Petra
description: An ancient city carved into rose-red cliffs in Jordan, famous for its archaeological heritage and rock-cut architecture.

name: Pyramids of Giza
description: A complex of ancient Egyptian pyramids and the Great Sphinx, a testament to the engineering prowess of the ancients.

name: Red Square

description: A colorful and iconic Russian Orthodox cathedral in Moscow, renowned for its distinctive architecture.

name: Statue of Liberty

name: Stonehenge

name: Sydney Opera House

name: The Acropolis of Athens
